de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core

Class Universe

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtendableObject
      • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.Universe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable

    public final class Universe
extends ExtendableObject
implements NotificationListener
    This class implements the "Universe" object

    Patches:

    Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org) on 08/23/2005:
         The x-y-z dimemsion of the Universe the time step of the simulation must be loaded before all sebsequent extensions. A seed tag has been added in order to be able to feed the RNG.

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    1.0-1.1 Illya Stepanov, 1.0 1.1 Gregor Schiele, 1.2 Jerome Haerri

      • sendNotification

        public void sendNotification(Notification notification)
        Notification passing method.

        Method is used to pass simulation notifications to listeners. Listener can be registered using the addNotificationListener method. The simulation environment sends the notification to all registered listeners.
        Specified by:
        sendNotification in interface NotificationListener
        Overrides:
        sendNotification in class ExtendableObject
        Parameters:
        notification - notification

      • advanceTime

        public void advanceTime()
        Executes a single simulation timestep.

        Performs execution of the exetensions and nodes, increments simulation time.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Re-Initializes all variables.

        Resets current time, remove all nodes, deletes extensions, and resets the random number generator
        Since:
        1.2

      • load

        public void load(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the object from XML tag.

        Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org) :
             - A seed extention has been added
             - x-y-z dim + step + seed are loaded before all subsequent extensions.
        Specified by:
        load in interface XMLStreamable
        Overrides:
        load in class ExtendableObject
        Parameters:
        element - source tag
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if parameters are invalid
